inn1.comm: good one to begin proceedings, landing it on a great length and getting it to move in sharply, but Sehwag covers off stump and shoulders arms
this one too comes in off a length, and Sehwag opens the bat face to pick up one to third man, India on the board
great stuff, moving away from him from middle and leg and he has to hustle to defend it, good pace and bounce
now he drifts down leg stump and Gambhir has no hassles, just flicks it away past square and the ball screams across the turf, top shot
leg stump again, he nudges it in front of midwicket and calls for the run, Sehwag is slow and shuffles around, then gets back but doesnt ground his bat and that was close, had it hit the stumps...
too far down leg stump
good length on off stump, he hurries to defend it down in front of point
good length just outside off stump, Sehwag drives coming forward, the ball rolls to mid-off
strays down leg stump, flicks it down to fine leg for one
lands it on a good length, some movement into him, defended down in front of point

good shout! Moves in from a length, Gambhir pushes across the front leg, the ball deviates and there's a noise as it skims the pads, they all go up in appeal, looked like it may have done too much to carry on over the top of off stump
beaten! Goes straight through Gambhir and the 'keeper, and runs away for byes
angled across Sehwag this time, who stands and drives only to get beaten
back of a length on the stumps, he gets up and defends it back down the track to Mortaza
down the legs, he tries to flick but its too far away from him
overpitched, looking for that yorker on off stump, Gambhir turns the bat as he defends to the on side
too full down the legs, Gambhir flicks it over backward square leg and thats four, dont bowl that line!
better, better...angling away off a goodish length outside off stump, Gambhir thinks about driving it but then holds off on the shot
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and opens the face, running it at the last second down to third man
back of a length outside off stump, marginally slower delivery, Sehwag gets a good look at it and shoulders arms
slower outside off stump, he leans into it and drives straight to cover
good length, moving in from outside off stump, he gets over it and drives towards point
good length outside off stump, Gambhir uses the soft hands to just drop it in front  of point and Sehwag responds well to the call for one
good length just outside off stump, Sehwag sees the width however and cuts hard, failing to beat point with that shot
good length on leg stump, pushed in the gap at midwicket and settles for a brace
fraction of width outside off stump and Sehwag flays it, one-handed, up and over the gap between backward point and gully, loosely executed but four nonetheless!
back of a length outside off stump, run down to third man for one
a tad fuller this time outside off stump, he stands and drives, getting an inside-edge to midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
good length outside off stump, moves in as Sehwag covers off and shoulders arms
lovely! Sits up off a slightly shorter length and beats Sehwag's backfoot defense, nice kick off the surface on that delivery
good length, seams in, Sehwag comes forward and turns the bat face, picking up one in front of square leg to retain strike
back of a length on middle and leg, Sehwag gets back and waits for it, turning it around the corner for two
this one goes away from him, a tad, and he drives to point, but Rasel's overstepped
back of a length, he stands and drives, in the air, but the ball dies well before cover
back of a length on middle and leg, he turns it to the onside but Rasel fields quickly to cut off ideas of the sharp single
back of a length outside off stump, Sehwag plants the front leg forward and drives lustily, but connects with air, beaten by the extra bounce
this one angles away from him and he reaches out, running it to third man for one
lands outside off stump, deviates, but its so slow that Gambhir has time to wait and dab it down to third man
good length on off stump, he pokes at it tentatively, drawing the inside-edge to short fine leg and the slight misfield there allows Gambhir to pick up the two he was calling for from the word go
back of a length on middle and leg, he hops up and taps it down the track, its another no-ball
a tad fuller outside off stump, now he comes over it and runs it to third man for one
short of a length outside off stump, up he goes, on the toes, pushing it to point
short again, and again he gets up, this time driving backward of point but an athletic stop there from Aftab saves runs
back of a length, seaming away, Gambhir initially ponders flashing at it but then shoulders arms as he shuffles across, good leave
width offered, he cuts hard past point and there's a bobble down on the ropes that allows the second
bang, thats six! Sehwag makes room, sees the length and width and creams that over long-off for maximum, stands and admires the shot
close! This one's straighter, Sehwag stands and clouts it just over mid-on, the fielder was late to move and had to back peddle
full length delivery, defended to cover

this time he's gone! Sehwag plays the same shot three balls out of four, connecting well on the first, feebly on the second, and making a total hash of the third! Rasel sticks to the same line, pitching it full, asking him to hit it, and all Sehwag does is slog it straight up in the air for mid-off to run across and take a diving catch, tumbling over after completing the catch and getting mobbed by his team-mates
good length on off stump, driven to mid-off
full and wide, tempting him to drive, but he sees it and leaves it be
nice! Bouncer to welcome him! He ducks down as it sails over his left shoulder
back of a length, moving in, he gets behind the line and defends back to Mortaza

edged and that doesnt carry! Lands on a shortish length, moves ever so slightly, Dhoni stands and pokes at it, but the edge doesnt carry to first slip even as the 'keeper lunges across to his right, and Dhoni's off the mark
fuller on the pads, Dhoni eases across and flicks in front of square, Rasel on the ropes runs across and gets a lazy boot on it, helping the ball over the boundary
bounce and carry again! Mortaza bangs it short, the ball fairly rears off the surface and whizzes past Dhoni's nose as he gets up on the toes to leave it
another edge, another let-off! Dhoni stands leaden-footed and flashes at one, but for the second time in a great over the thick edge just doesnt carry to first slip and Mortaza shakes his head

fraction short and wide, he steers it straight to Aftab at backward point, where the awkward bounce after he fields it bounces into his family jewels and he's down in pain...may seem funny but its going to be hurting for Aftab
back of a length, jags into him and he has to hustle to defend
moves in off a good length again, Gambhir pokes at it and the thick edge bounces well in front of the deep lone slip
width offered, he goes back and cuts, but doesnt time it well at all, the ball chips into the ground
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
beaten outside off-stump.A hint of swing
a quick single taken, Dhoni plays it to mid-off and they scurry for a single
straying down the leg side and brushes the thigh pad on the way to the fine leg boundary for a boundary
played with soft hands and they scamper for a quick single.
a dot ball to finish the over.
short delivery and pulled over the mid wicket for a four
flicked away for a single
Dhoni pats it back to the bowler.
Dhoni plays it to mid-off with soft hands and they jog for an easy single.
fuller length and defended to covers
again beaten outside off stump.No foot movement by the batsman.
full on the legs and flicked to the fine leg for a boundry
back of a length and driven straight to cover.
a full blooded cut shot but couldnt get it past the off side circle.
bouncer an it sails over Dhoni's shoulder to the keeper.
back of a length and Dhoni plays it into the hands of vthe cover fielder.
a length ball on thye off stump and defended to cover
short and wide and an uppish cut over the gully for one
fuller on off stump and driven straight to mid-off
length ball on the off stump and Dhoni just plays it to cover point
outside off stump and left alone by Dhoni
again a fuller length and played to covers
tossed up from over the stumps, Gambhir comes forward and works it to midwicket for one
now he goes around the stumps, firing it in on leg stump and Dhoni cant work it away
quicker, flatter outside off stump and he cuts it to deep cover
he's had enough, coming out of his crease and hitting it on the up, not timed well at all but he clears mid-off and picks up two
quicker one outside off stump, he comes forward and pokes at it, getting an inside-edge very near the stumps
quick and flat again, this time he uses the feet well and creams that on the up through the gap at cover for four
good length on off stump, driven back to the bowler
good length on off stump, Gambhir  plays across the pads as he turns it to square leg
fraction of width offered and he runs it off the face of the bat, late, down to third ma for the easiest of singles
full on middle and leg, Dhoni comes forward and drives to long-off for one
straighter one this time and Gambhir turns it around the corner down to fine leg for a hard-run three, good running between the wickets from these two
back of a length outside off stump, punched to cover this time
tossed up, he comes down the track and flicks to midwicket
floated up well wide of off stump, Dhoni has a look at it, waits, waits and then leaves it be
tossed up wide again, this time he eases forward and pokes at it, gets an outer edge, but as theres no slip in place he gets four to third man
quicker one, spins into him off a short length, he goes back and cuts hard to the man at gully
tossed up wide, he waits for it, then sees it staying low but adjusts well to cut past a diving backward point, beating another despairing dive on the ropes
tossed up, driven to point this time
tossed up outside off stump, stays low, Gambhir rolls the wrists to pick up one to short fine leg

dropped! Flatter trajectory outside off stump, Dhoni rocks back and biffs that back down the track, where the bowler does well to get a hand on it, you can say it was dropped but then at that force, hats off to anyone who manages to hold on!
tossed up, he gets down and steers it to  backward point
tossed up on off stump, defended to cover
tossed up again, just pushed into cover for a quick single
tossed up, he makes room and cuts but fails to connect
tossed up on leg stump, mistimes the attempted nudge off the pads
tossed up, comes down the track and flicks straight to midwicket
tossed up teasingly, comes down the track and pads it away
flatter one, flicked to midwicket for one this time
shorter one, played to cover
tossed up on off stump, he drives back to the bowler's left
tossed up outside off stump, steered wide of point for one
tossed up, Gambhir comes out and defends to cover
tossed up wider, again he comes out and this time flicks to midwicket
tossed up wide, but this time instead of whipping across the line he makes room and drives over cover-point for four
tossed up wide again, and Gambhir reaches across and drives in the gap behind point and running hard for two, and thats the 100 for India
quicker, flatter, spins in from outside off stump and Gambhir adjusts nicely to work it around the corner
tossed up on off stump, Gambhir drives down to long-on for a single
tossed up outside off stump, Dhoni waits for it and then steers it in the gap at point
tossed up, uses the feet well and drives to mid-on this time
well flighted up, Dhoni comes forward and defends
tossed up on the stumps, Dhoni drives back to the bowler, and sections of the crowd think its a return catch and go up in cheer
tossed up, again he drives back to Saqibul
tossed up from over the stumps, Gambhir steers it to backward point
tossed up on off stump, he turns it across the stumps to midwicket
flatter outside off stump, enough room for Dhoni to drive into the covers
quicker and flatter, right in the blockhole, sees Gambhir come out and bowls it very well
flat again on off stump, but this time Gambhir drives wide of mid-off to raise his third ODI half-century, well played
tossed up, Dhoni drives back to the left of Rafique, who moves across and fields but doesnt get there in time
tossed up, he's beaten in the flight but manages to adjust and pick up one backward of point
tossed up invitingly, he uses the feet well and lifts it over midwicket, good shot!
now he goes offside, cashing in on a low full toss and driving it through the covers for four more
tossed up on off stump, works it with the wrists to short fine leg and Dhoni scurries off down the track
tossed up, he gets ovet it and taps it to point, where the fielder swoops in and does well to cut off thoughts of the run
quicker one on the stumps, he on-drives but Saqibul gets across and fields
tossed up outside off stump, Gambhir comes forward and just pushes into covers for one
uses the feet, bowler fires it quicker, but he adjusts well to flick through midwicket for a couple
slower ball, looped up and Dhoni makes room to leg before pushing in front of point for a quick single, he looks very athletic today
tossed up again, Gambhir eases it wide of point for another easy single
flatter ball on middle and off, driven back down past the stumps and Gambhir, Rafique dives and gets a hand to it, collides with the nonstriker and Dhoni pinches one
tossed up on off stump, worked to square leg, Dhoni sets off, gets sent back and just manages to turn and dive back into the crease
tossed up outside off stump, worked late and in front of point
flatter, shorter, spins into him as he opens the face and works it away for one past point
uses the feet, bowler sees him coming and holds it back, beating him in the flight and forcing him to defend to cover
shorter one, he gets up on one leg and awkwardly - some would say perfectly - chips it down to long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to long-on for one
tossed up, pushed to the man at cover
flat and quick on middle and off, flicked back down the track to Rafique
tossed up, worked straight to midwicket
tossed up, defended back to Rafique
tossed up outside off stump, he uses the feet well, driving with the spin, and picking up one to long-on

edged and gone! Rafique fires it full and wide, Dhoni makes room and cuts, getting low as sees the ball staying down too, and the under-edge is snapped up brilliantly by Rahim! Dhoni doesnt even wait for the umpire's signal, just shuts up shop and makes for the pavilion
quick outside off stump, he gets back and defends, but the inside-edge almost sneaks back onto off stump
tossed up, defended to midwicket
tossed up wide of off stump, he leans into a lovely cover drives but the fielder dives and saves runs, good stop
but not this time! Gambhir replays the shot and beats the man this time, all timing and placement
comes out, bowler sees him coming and fires it flat and he works it to leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, he plays ovet it and gets hit outside the line of impact
fired in on middle and leg, worked to square leg
flat and wide, he cuts well but fails to beat backward point
tossed up on off stump, he uses the feet brilliantly and on-drives past mid-on, inside the circle, for four, top shot that!
tossed up again, he shuffles across and drives to the left of mid-off this time
tossed up on off stump, driven back to Rafique
tossed up again, driven back to the bowler
tossed up, he drives to cover this time
tossed up on off stump, defended to cover
tossed up on off stump, he comes across and flicks into the gap at midwicket
tossed up, he gets over it and drops it in front of point, responding well to the call from Gambhir
comes out, bowler sees him and changes the line, Gambhir adjusts well and works it to square leg
flatter outside off stump, he rolls the wrists and gets one backward of square
tossed up outside off stump, Yuvraj reaches for it and steers it to backward point
tossed up on off stump, flicked to mid-on, and yes, he's struggling here against the slow men
flat down leg stump, worked off the pads but straight to short fine leg
flat again on leg stump, this time he paddles it in the gap around the corner
tossed up, he comes down the track, doesnt get to the pitch at all but follows through with the chip shot over mid-on, a short-arm jab, really, and clears the ropes
tossed up again, he doesnt time it well again but gets enough bat on the chip shot to clear mid-off and the ball trickles over the ropes for four
he changes the angle around the stumps, fires it flat on leg stump, and Yuvraj flicks to fine leg for one
fired in on leg stump, he looks to turn it fine but mistimes the stroke
tossed up outside off stump, he plants the leg out and sweeps hard, across the line, and picks the gap over mid-on
flatter down leg stump, beats Yuvraj and Rahim and wide is the signal from the umpire
comes out, bowler fires it flat and wide down leg but he uses the feet well to work it to mid-on for one
slower one, changes the grip on that one, Yuvraj gets over it and defends

oh ho, talk about cashing in on the last over of Powerplay! Yuvraj gets a step down and has a little short-arm chip shot/jab/whatever you want to call it, no backlift whatsover but connecting excellently for six over mid-on again
tossed up, stays low and he misses out on the cut
tossed up, he comes out and drives to the on side
tossed up outside off stump, he chips to mid-on for an easy single
tossed up, he drives out to long-on for one
flat on off stump, this time he has an ambitous heave across the line and ends up with one out to deep midwicket
tossed up, flicked into the midwicket region for one
tossed up, comes out and chips it in the air wide of mid-on, good running

taken! Softest of soft dismissals! Tossed up, good rotation, and what does he do? He plays out in front of his pad, closing the bat face awkwardly, and presents Rafique with the easiest of caught-and-bowled chances, and I mean easy - just popped back to his palms. Yuvraj stands there, shakes his head, and ambles off while Rafique gleefully savours the wicket
tossed up, rapped on the pad but it was outside off stump
tossed up, driven to long-on but Dravid refuses the single
flatter trajectory, worked to square leg for one
tossed up, driven out to deep cover for one
tossed up wide of off stump, he waits and waits and cuts to backward point
quicker outside off stump, Dravid cuts but doesnt connect at all
tossed up, slower one, he waits and then works it to short fine leg
flat down leg stump, he gets down and sweeps, not timed well at all and fails to find the gap
tossed up, driven back to the bowler
tossed up, he gets over it and defends to point
tossed up wide, he waits for it, gets over it and cuts to gully
tossed up outside off stump, sweeps across the line and only gets one for his efforts
fullish on off stump, worked to long-on for one
overpitched outside off stump, he leans into it and drives loosely behind point for one
full on off stump, Dravid on-drives for one, jogging through to complete the run
good length outside off stump, he opens the face and steers it down to third man
slower ball outside off stump, he drives to cover
this one's quicker and surprises everyone by kicking off a length, Dravid has to withdraw from the shot and Rahim has to dive across the stumps to take it and get out of the way of the awkward bounce
tossed up outside off stump, Gambhir drives out to long-off for one, though Saqibul did get a hand to take some pace off the shot
tossed up on leg stump, flicked around the corner for one
tossed up outside off stump, Gambhir comes out and flicks but cant beat a diving midwicket
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts past a diving cover and the outfield does the rest, good aggressive shot
shot! Uses the feet excellently, coming out and chipping it over mid-on for four
dropped! Fired in fuller, he drives airily back down the track, Saqibul sticks his hands out to his left and tries to latch on, but cant, as it was hit hard and fast
slower, real slow outside off stump, Dravid runs it to backward point for a very quick single
slow and wide, he waits for it and steers it towards gully
short of a length, he stands up and plays a tired chip shot wide of mid-on
slow one angled down leg stump, Dravid plays out in front of his pads and works it to fine leg for three, thanks in no small part to a fresh pair of Sehwag legs
short of a length outside off stump, cut out to deep backward point
short and wide, cut hard past point out to the sweeper on the move, who covers good ground and dives on the ropes
flat on off stump, Gambhir shuffles back and works it to midwicket for one
quick and flat, comes on with the arm, catching Dravid by surprise, he defends and gets an inside-edge to leg
tossed up on off stump, Gambhir gets well forward and turns it to mid-on and progresses to 99
tossed up on leg stump, tickled fine for one

and there's the 100, the second of his career, as he stands and works one out to deep midwicket, getting out of the way and sauntering over to point, arms raised, in celebration. Its been a fighting knock in hot, sultry conditions. Well played
tossed up on middle and leg, driven between midwicket and long-on for a couple, Sehwag runs the second quickly but seems troubled...dont tell me the runner is cramping up as well?
short and wide, he cracks it off the back foot out to the sweeper
slower one on off stump, driven to mid-on

bowled 'em! Fullish outside off stump, and a tired Gambhir heaves across the line only to get a bottom-edge back onto off stump, thats the shot of a weary man but a good hundred...he hobbles off the field to some decent applause from his team-mates
and he's off the mark with the easist of cover drives though the off side for four
slower one, he chops it down to third man
fuller one outside off stump, driven to mid-off
tossed up, he comes out and drives to long-off
flatter on off stump, pushed to mid-on
tossed up, he shuffles and flicks to midwicket
fired in on leg stump, worked to backward square leg
tossed up on off stump, he gets down and sweeps it to fine leg
tossed up on leg, swept out to fine leg, thought about the second but resisted
length ball on middle stump, played to fine leg
fuller delivery on the off stump, tried to heave it across the line, raped on the pads
slower delivery, slogged it over the widish mid wicket
fuller on the off stump, played to long off
played back to Rasel, a bit of a mix up between the two batsmen, but they are safe in the end
full and wide, square driven to deep point for a single
flat and on the off stump, played to deep mid
flat on the off stump, punced to long off
flat and on the stumps, patted back to the bowler
full length on the middle stump, played to long-on
Mongia backs away and tries to play it over in the offf side, is beaten
slower ball, beaten by the change of pace, another dot ball
bouncer,surprises Mongia, good bowling by Mortaza
wider of the off stump, square cut to third man for two
short of length stuff, pulled to mid wicket for a single
ahain a short of length stuff, Dravid plays a good loking square cut but good fielding at point
tossed up on off stump, flicked just wide of mid-on

gone! Tossed up, out dances Mongia, getting underneath it and just slogging it up in the air down towards mid-off, where a sprightly Rafique runs a long way in from the ropes, keeps his eyes on the ball, and takes a tumbling catch
tossed up outside off stump, he tries to steer it fine but misses
quicker, flatter, Dravid cuts hard and gets a thickish edge past a diving short third man, the ball races down to the boundary
quicker on the stumps, this time he looks to paddle it fine, theres a loud appeal as the ball turns away, but negated by the umpire as he rules it wouldve spun past off stump
tossed up, worked away to the off side for one
quick on off stump, Karthik shuffles to off and works it to leg for one
tossed up, pushed into the covers for one
down the leg side, down he goes, paddle-sweeping it past short fine leg for four

tossed up on middle and leg stump, the ball spins down as Karthik shuffles across and forward and plays with the turn, playing all over it, Rafique appeals...and thats a very surprising decision given that he was so far down the track, and that the ball bounced a bit too...ah well, thats the game of cricket for you
tossed up, driven to midwicket to get off the mark very first ball of his career, that'll feel nice I bet
tossed up, pushed to midwicket
tossed up, driven straight to cover
tossed up, he gently nudges that in front of mid-on and sprints
tossed up very wide of off stump, and its called just that
tossed up outside off stump, he shuffles and taps it in front of square leg, where a poor throw gives up an extra run
superb stumping! Chawla comes out, Razzak sees it, fires it down leg stump, he's way out of his crease as the ball spins past him, and in a flash Rahim takes it and whips off the bails
again tossed up outside leg stump, wide called
tossed up, quicker, Powar closes the bat face too early and the leading edge is nearly held by the bowler but it hits the ground before him
tossed up, played back to Razzak
short of a length outside off stump, he gets up and runs it down to third man, very close to the body, for one
this one kicks off a short length, Powar's feet go nowhere as he flashes at it and connects with air
short again, now he steadies himself and opens the face of the bat to pick up a single down to third man
oversteps, its a bouncer outside off stump which Dravid pulls out of
slower, fuller, outside off stump, driven down to long off for a brace
low full toss outside off stump, attempted slow yorker goes wrong, Dravid punches that past point out to the sweeper, Ashraful
again the slower one goes wrong, from the bowler's perspective, as it loops up and dies outside off stump, but Powar thinks its going to be called wide and doesnt do anything...very useful dot ball!
tossed up, Dravid backs away to leg and only ends up driving to cover
tossed up on off stump, this time its a reverse-sweep to third man
flatter one, he makes room to leg and crunches the drive to deep extra cover for a hard-run two
flat again on off stump, Powar makes room to free the arms and eyes the extra cover ropes, hitting over the fielder but fails to find the boundary
tossed up, he has a heave and connects with absolutely nothing
identical delivery, identical result, and Powar fails to cash in on two deliveries
he oversteps, its short and wide and Dravid slaps it to cover for the single
slower, quite wide of off stump, Powar leaves it be and its called wide, duly

gone! Powar shuffles across the stumps, then tries to cheekily work it fine, misses it and gets hit in front of the stumps, that ball was in the blockhole and the umpire's finger shot up without a second thought
well disguised slower delivery outside off stump, Zaheer doesnt pick it and thats another dot ball
short of a length outside off stump, he gets up on the toes and smashes it well in the gap between cover and mid-off and finds the ropes
full toss outside off stump, Zaheer chases it and uppercuts over backward point for valuable runs
a poor ball, Mortaza's slower one doesnt come out well, misdirected well wide of off stump
short-pitched delivery comes into him, Zaheer tries to get out of the way and then decides, what the hell, lets pull it, but does to awkwardly
fullish outside off stump, Dravid eyes midwicket and gets down to slog it away, but the result is an inside-edge back onto the front leg and a scampered single as India finish on 284 for 8

inn2.comm: full ball outside leg stump, he oversteps, Omar gets trapped on the crease
fuller one angled across him, he pokes, gets the edge, but it drops in front of second slip
another one's angled past him off the seam, and he's beaten trying to poke it
back of a length outside off stump, he tries a cut but again fails to make any contact
fuller one outside off stump, now he has an impetuous waft away from the body, feet going nowhere, and misses all ends up
angled wide of off stump, Omar leaves it be and Dhoni collects it as it rolls along the ground to him
back of a length outside leg stump, moves in as Omar gets tangled up trying to work it to leg
back of a length on off stump, pushed to point, no chance of a run there
lands on a good length and seams away, Tamim shoulders arms, again not bouncing very much as Dhoni collects
straighter one, Tamim shuffles and works it past square leg for two, well played
back of a length outside off stump, driven to Karthik who dives at cover-point and saves runs
quicker delivery, sitting up off a short length outside off stump, Tamim watches it and leaves
another short one, this time over off stump, as Tamim gets down and out of the way
back of a length outside off stump, jabbed down towards a diving Yuvraj at backward point, athletic stop there
now he cashes in, timing his drive well and slamming it in the gap between cover and point for four
straighter and fuller, he drives well back down the ground, Zaheer reaches across and takes some pace off the ball and mid-off does the fielding
back of a good length on the stumps, he hops up and defends to leg
good length outside off stump, he gets a good look at it and holds back on the shot, Dhoni takes
overpitched, fractionally, and he drives straight to mid-off
fullish outside off stump, he drives at it but fails to make contact
too far down leg stump, deviates too much and wide called
short of a length outside off stump, he just stands there and chases it, getting a thick edge in the gap at gully
room offered again, and once more he chases it with a thick edge but now there's cover at third man...words between the batsman and bowler
good length on off stump, he hops up and defends
beaten! Lands one on a great length, gets movement off the seam, and beats Omar's attempt at a prod
straighter on middle and leg, Omar flicks nicely in the gap at midwicket, Powar does the chasing and keeps them to three, a good shot though
down leg stump, stays low too, wide called
beaten again! Fuller just outside off stump, moves in, he swings across the line and misses, and boy that was pretty close to the stumps!
good length outside off stump, he lunges forward and gets hit, a loud appeal but outside the line of impact
back of a length outside leg stump, tapped around the corner for one
back of a length, moves into him, Tamim looks to work it fine but ends up squared up and defending to the off
short of a length into the ribs, he gets up on the toes and taps it back down the track

low full toss, driven to mid-off, calls for one, then some no-no-wait business, Omar's confused and sends him back, but even a despairing dive cant save Tamim from Chawla's excellent throw to Dhoni and he's livid with his partner, looking back and shouting at him, cursing, and even Omar doesnt hold back with his response...veteran and rookie having a little spat there, as all await the third umpire's decision, but that was clearly out
good length on the stumps, he nearly falls over as he defends
lovely! Great ball, shaping away from the bat off an excellent length and squaring him up
short one kicks up into the ribs, he jumps up and keeps it down to short fine leg
short of a length, he moves out of the way and lets Dhoni collect it
good length on off stump, he hustles to defend it back to the off side
a tad fuller on middle and off, Omar flicks across the line, dangerously, but finds the gap at midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, pushed to square leg and he wants one, but Omar says NO
great shot! Not overpitched, but he gets to it and just caresses it back down the ground for four, all timing in that
fullish outside leg stump, he looks to flick but doesnt get any bat on it, the ball rolls to square leg
back of a length on the stumps, bowled from around the stumps, and Omar defends it
back of a length on the stumps again, he gets behind the line and pushes to mid-on
good length on off stump, he jams bat and pad together and defends to the off side
back of a length outside off stump, moves away, Aftab's taken by surprise but plays it softly into the ground
banged in shorter down leg stump, Aftab tries to flick it away but misses, and a wide's called anyway
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked to square leg, cant find the gaps
a tad slower, lands on a length outside off stump and shapes away, sucking Aftab forward
overpitched, a little, and he goes through with a lofted chip shot over mid-off, not timed well at all but safely over the infield for two
much better! Munaf strays to leg stump and Aftab unleashes his favorite stroke, the effortless flick off the pads over midwicket for maximum, the 46th six of his career
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to mid-off for a risky single
back of a length but Aftab charges down the track and takes it on the full, smashes it past mid-off
banged the ball in, jabbed to cover
short of length ball onn the off-stump, tucked to square leg
dropped  full length, and it was firmly struck, went straight to Dravid at covers and spills out, that must have hurt
short of a length on the off-stump, played to mid-off
fuller this time, plyed to covers
full and on the off-stump, patted back to the bowler
Omar Belim comes down the track but the delivery jagged back into him, punches it to the point and they scamper for a single
back of a length and Aftab defends it back to the bowler
Aftab charges but Munaf surprises him with a bouncer, he manages to get it to fine leg for a single
shoort of length and defended to covers
another short delivery and this time played straight to square leg
length ball on the off-stump and Aftab plays a Marillier scoop over fine leg
anothr length ball and this time Aftab comes down the track and lifts it over the infield over the off side
Zaheer oversteps by a mile and it was wide too
slower delivery, makes room and drives to extra cover
another slower ball and this time the batsman gets deceived, he is too early into his shot and Karthik jumps up and plucks a nice catch at cover
short of a length and homing around the off-stump, played to the covers
fuller this time and played back to the bowler
full length delivery and tucked behind square leg for a single
another fullish delivery and played back to the bowler
that was an attempted yorker and was defended to covers
this time its back of the length and the batsman plays it with soft hands to mid-off for a single
another back of a length delivery and Aftab again tries that cheeky scoop and misses it this time, some words are beinng exchanged
fuller this time andd on the off-stump, played to extra cover
no ball to start the over and a single is pinched as well
that was in the air but in the gap as well, goes over the mid wicket for  a boundary
this time Saqibul backs off to play in the off side, Zaheer comes up with a yorker and that was not far from his led-stump
this time, the batsman gets a thick edge and it goes straight into Dhoni's hands, Saqibul doesn't even bother to wait for the umpire's decision and walks off to the pavilion
just short of good length, played with soft hands into covers and a quick single taken
full length and on the off-stump, played to the point fielder
this time slightly shorter but again very straight, played to the point again
an effort ball by Munaf, extra bounce, tucked behind square leg
fuller and played to mid wicket for a single
pitched up and a bit of width on offer, Aftab freees his arms and the ball races to the cover boundary
a dot ball to end the over, fuller and outside off, Aftab plays and misses
looped up, too much width, and he hammers it through cover point, welcome to ODI cricket!
flighted up on the stumps, Ashraful plays it softly to he off side and sets off for one
quicker, flatter, and it spins past Aftab, who plays and misses
quicker one, the googly, sits up and rears as Aftab manages to play it akwardly
tossed up on leg stump and its swept out to Munaf at backward square leg
flatter outside off stump, Ashraful comes onto the front foot and pushes to mid-off for an urgent single
tossed up on the stumps, worked straight to short fine leg
tossed up on leg stump, swept hard to fine leg where Mongia dives and saves runs
tossed up nicely, worked to midwicket
good turn outside off stump, steered to backward point
flatter one on off stump, he comes forward and flicks to deep midwicket
spins from middle and off down leg, Aftab plays with the turn but cant get bat to it
tossed up from over the stumps, and Ashraful takes the opportunity to drive on the up over cover for an easy two
looped up, the googly, Ashraful doesnt pick and looks to drive over cover, but ends up spooning it over mid-on, lucky!
tossed up, he gets down to sweep, gets a bottom-edge that scoots between Dhoni's leg and runs away for byes
well flighted outside off stump, pushed into the covers for a quick single
ripping googly! Maiden wicket for Chawla, who gets one to spin in sharply, Ashraful moves to leg, exposing the stumps, the bat comes down very late and he hears the death rattle. Chawla loves it.
short and flat, spins the other way, he cuts well into the covers
tossed up on off stump, he plays across the line tamely, the ball bops up, Dhoni collects, no appeal
quicker through the air outside off stump, stays low as Bashar lunges across and gets beaten
tossed up, he comes out and flicks to midwicket
quicker, shorter, and worked to midwicket
tossed up, worked to midwicket
tossed up, he comes forward and gets tangled up in the delivery
looped up, he gets forward and plods it back to Chawla
looped up outside off stump, enough room for Bashar to drive out to deep backward point
quicker through the air, lands on middle and off, defended
nicely flighted up on off stump, he gets forward in defense
quicker, good loop, outside off stump, he gets down to sweep and misses
tossed up, he comes forward and defends to cover
tossed up outside off stump, he opts for a reverse-sweep, and the ball pops up over Dhoni's head and runs fine
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, defended
tossed up, uses the feet, gets caught up and the ball pops up to leg off the pads
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it to square leg
tossed up on a length, spins into him as he goes back and works it to midwicket
cleaned up! Powar strikes, tossing one up outside off stump, it does enough to beat Aftab in flight, who just plonks the bat forward, misses, and looks back to see his off stump castled
looped up on off stump, he plants the leg forward and turns it with the spin to square leg
looped up again, Bashar gets forward and blocks it out
quicker, spins in as Bashar plants the leg forward, hit on the pad well outside the line of off stump, appeal turned down
tossed up, Bashar gets down and sweeps out to the man in the deep
quicker one, Rahim gets well forward and defends
slower this time, Rahim uses the feet well to push into the covers
spins in from off stump, Bashar adjusts and works it to square leg
tossed up on off stump, Bashar looks to work it across the line but misses out
flatter outside off stump, Bashar lunges forward and defends to point
well flighted on off stump, Bashar plays across the line but cannot beat any of the fielders
tossed up on off stump, defended
tossed up again, now Bashar saunters down the track and connects wonderfully, slamming it down over long-on for six, and not a bad way to break the shackles
looped up, beats Rahim in the flight and movement
tossed up, lovely flight, Rahim gets forward and pokes at it, drawing the edge that flies wide of the lone slip for two
wide of off stump, stays very low and beats batsman and very nearly Dhoni
looped up outside off stump, Rahim leaves it be
looped up invitingly, Rahim gets antsy and drives to a diving mid-on
quicker one, the googly, which Rahim reads and works off the pads to square leg
tossed up on off stump, defended back to Powar
quicker, spins into him, Bashar adjusts and works it off the pads for one
tossed up nicely on middle and leg, spins past the pads
tossed up, then it drops quickly and Rahim defends to cover
sees him using the feet and fires it in through the air on leg stump, Rahim adjusts and plays it to midwicket
tossed up, again it dips on Bashar, who has to play across the line in a hurry
well flighted on off stump, Rahim gets forward and pushes to point
looped up, starts to dip, Rahim judges it well and plants the leg forward, hitting down the ground for four to long-on
more air on this one, outside off stump, and Rahim's eyes light up, sees the length and hammers it to long-off this time
looped up, beats him outside off stump
well tossed up on the stumps, Rahim shuffles and taps it to square leg
spins down past leg stump, wide called
good rotation on that one, fizzed up outside off stump, Rahim gets well forward and defends
tossed up on a length, spins in as Bashar plants the leg forward and defends
tossed up, Bashar comes out of his crease and lofts it down to long-on for one
tossed up, Rahim dances down the track, gets to the pitch and just follows through with a confident slam straight back down the ground for half a dozen!
quicker, spins into Rahim, who makes room and cuts down to gully
quicker, flatter outside off stump, Bashar backs away and cuts wide of gully for a hard-earned three
dropped! Tossed up, stays low outside off stump as Rahim flirts with it and the edge is dropped by Dhoni, was tough but still...
tossed up, defended back to the bowler
tossed up, flicked to midwicket for one
quicker, flatter, he gets back and across and taps it to leg
tossed up, defended to cover
tossed up, on the stumps, pushed to mid-on
tossed up, spins into Bashar, who gets back and just taps it back down the track
tossed up, spins sharply into Bashar, who backs away and cuts into the covers
tossed up, dips on him and he defends
flatter one, stays straight, he shuffles and works it to square leg
well flighted on middle and leg, spins down, Bashar misses out on the flick
tossed up on middle and off, Bashar again cant work him away to leg and thats a maiden over
tossed up on about leg stump, Rahim flicks to square leg for one
straighter one, off stump, Bashar shuffles and works it to leg
tossed up, he gets forward and turns it but cannot beat short fine leg
fraction short, he gets down on one knee and sweeps out to the deep midwicket sweeper
tossed up, he gets forward and flicks in the gap at square leg
tossed up, well flighted and then it dips on Rahim, who thinks about driving but has to defend
tossed up, Bashar comes skipping down but has to adjust to work it to leg as he's not to the pitch
tossed up, rotates and spins away from him, and beats him
quicker, straighter, slides into Bashar who defends back to Powar
tossed up on off stump, flicked straight to short fine leg
flatter on off stump, nudged down to long-on for one, finally
comes out, Powar follows him flat down leg stump, and he has to nudge it to mid-on
tossed up, uses the feet well and drives past mid-off for one
flatter, stays fairly straight as Bashar rocks back and pushes to midwicket
tossed up, room on offer, Rahim cuts well in the gap behind square out to the sweeper
arm ball on off stump, he shuffles and works it to square leg with ease
tossed up, and all Bashar does is defend
comes down, Mongia keeps it simple and flat, and Bashar can only defend back to him, good stuff to continue to stifle the captain
tossed up outside off stump, Rahim turns it around the corner to short fine leg
flatter this time, worked wide of square leg
quicker through the air, outside off stump, down goes Bashar in an attempt to sweep but fails
tossed up, he comes down the track and ends up just stopping it at his feet
tossed up, driven straight to cover...yawn...
arm ball on the stumps, he adjusts and works it towards square leg
tossed up, spins in, he goes back and defends to Powar
flatter, fuller, Bashar flicks to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Rahim uses the feet well and drives past a diving Mongia to long-off
short, flat, cut hard to cover, where Karthik dives and stops it
tossed up, comes out and defends to cover
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps hard and Sehwag has work to do, cutting it off near the ropes
tossed up, Rahim checks his shot and drives back down the ground to Powar, who dives to stop it and fumbles
flat on middle and off, flicked to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, plays across the line and works it to short fine leg
quicker, flatter, stays low outside off stump and beats Bashar's cut
tossed up outside off stump, straighter one, confuses Bashar who just plonks forward
flat on off stump, shuffles across and flicks to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, defended via the inside-edge to leg
width offered, and this time he doesnt miss out, cutting well in the gap in front of square
tossed up on the stumps, flicked away to square leg
flatter, slower, Bashar exposes the stumps, waits, and cuts, getting an inside-edge close to leg stump
tossed up, comes out and flicks to mid-on
flat down leg stump, worked off the pads to short fine leg
tossed up from over the stumps, defended

that was quick! Tossed up, Rahim gets down on bended knee, sweeps hard, but gets a top-edge thats well snapped up by Karthik, running back from mid-on, keeping his eyes on it, and taking it over his head
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to leg, Dhoni fields and Mortaza's stranded down the track, gets home safely
too far down leg stump
tossed up, patted back to the bowler
flat down leg stump, another wide, Yuvraj doesnt like it
flattish on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
flat on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
real slow stuff, and Mortaza works it from outside leg to fine leg
tossed up wide of off stump, Bashar cuts out to deep cover
tossed up, and as it spins away, he waits and cheekily runs it wide of Dhoni for four, top shot
tossed up on a length, he shuffles across and taps it to the on side
flatter trajectory, flicked to midwicket
shot! Tossed up, down he comes, slamming it down to long-on, where Munaf does well to stop it with his foot
tossed up, defended to the off side
tossed up, worked to leg for one and he'll keep strike
fraction width offered outside off stump, cut hard to backward point
looped up outside off stump, steered out to backward point again, but this time he gets one
flat on the stumps, Mortaza flicks from middle stump to square leg
well flighted delivery on off stump, Bashar plays out in front of his pad and the ball bobs up to the off side
flattish outside off stump, cut to cover
flat on off stump, dug out to long-on
flat on middle and leg, he makes room but is beaten by the pace, and taps it back to Yuvrvaj
tossed up on middle and off, he uses the feet and hammers it over wide long-on for maximum
a tad quicker on off stump, Bashar pushes to cover
flatter on off stump, he rocks back and pushes to cover
tossed up on middle and leg, worked out to deep backward square leg
flat on leg stump, worked past short fine leg for one
looped up on middle and off, he gets behind the line and then defends
tossed up, he makes room to hit inside-out, beaten by the flight, and Dhoni makes a mess of an easy stumping!

its all over for Bashar now! He doesnt learn, again making room and repeating the attempted slog, again missing completely, confounded by the big leg break, and this time Dhoni doesnt make any mistake
looped up, he comes forward and pushes at it, beaten
looped up, no spin, Rafique shuffles and defends to cover
looped up on off stump, he doesnt want to hang around, it seems, as indicated by a massive heave across the line that lands safely between two fielders out in the deep

and again! Tossed up, Mortaza clears the front leg and heaves at it, making a mess, the leading edge goes up for an eternity and lands safely between the men converging from mid-off and mid-on, would you believe?!?
tossed up on off stump, defended
tossed up wider, and this time beats Rafique's attempted cut
flatter on off stump, back he goes, pushing to cover
tossed up again, defended to cover
straighter, middle and leg, and Rafique works it out to deep backward square leg
nicely looped up across the stumps, he plays and misses
looped up fuller, this time he drives to cover
very, very wide, goes all wrong as it spins away
flatter on off stump, Rafique gets up on one leg and swivels it away to deep backward square leg
tossed up outside off stump, Rafique gets down and tries to sweep, gets hit outside the line, they appeal but its turned down
flat on middle and leg, defended
flat, no spin, down leg stump, wide
dropped! Tossed up, he hits over mid-off out to Mongia, who dives and tries his best, but doesnt hold on with the fingertips. Was very, very tough
tossed up outside leg stump, down he goes with the sweep, and misses
short and wide, he cuts and gets a thick edge down to third man
big! Tossed up, he slog-sweeps over midwicket for a dinger
flatter, quicker on off stump, he stands on one leg and pulls out to Munaf moving across on the deep midwicket ropes

tossed up invitingly from around the stumps, Rafique gets down and attempts the slog-sweep again, but picks out the man standing right back on the deep midwicket ropes, Uthappa, the sub for Gambhir, and the fireworks are over from him
looped up on middle and off, worked to midwicket
looped up again, defended to the on side
tossed up again, this time he flicks to midwicket
flat on off stump, from around the stumps, and Razzak thumps it down to long-on
looped up, outside off stump, and Razzak leaves it be
real short, real flat, and he gets into position and pulls over deep backward square leg for half a dozen
tossed up on off stump, pushed to mid-off
flat down leg stump, worked to short fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, driven across the line to mid-on
flat down leg stump, tucked down to fine leg
quicker one outside off stump, he swings the bat at it and misses
tossed up on off stump, worked to square leg
biggie! Dances down, even with the hamstring issues, and clouts it over mid-on for six
bigger, better! Stands and clips one off the pads rows back over midwicket, crowd loves it
now thats HUGE! Mortaza's having fun here! Stand and deliver! Picks it from where it lands and hammers it over wide long-on for six more!
Dan van Bunge, where are you?? Mortaza's giving Mongia some stick! Plants the leg out and slams this one straight back over long-off's head for six more! Carnage!
quick, flat down leg stump and he coolly clips it out to short fine leg for one
all over, as Mortaza stands and picks a length delivery up and into Sehwag's hands at mid-on. 42 from 22! Take a bow.
tossed up from around the stumps, defended to leg
quicker one on the stumps, defended
tossed up outside off stump, defended to cover
quicker, flatter, pulled into the midwicket region
comes out, Yuvraj fires it wide and Dhoni collects, wide is the call
tossed up, comes on with the arm, beats him
fired down the pads, worked away for one
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to square leg
tossed up on off stump, pokes at it and gets an inside-edge
tossed up, he uses the feet and flicks out to deep midwicket
tossed up, he goes down and slogs it out to deep midwicket to end the game, India victors by 46 runs and taking the series
